remarks: Given any transfinite cardinal number ` A ` , there is exactly one aleph that is equal to it.  Here we compute that aleph _explicitly_. (Contributed by NM, 9-Nov-2003.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 2-Feb-2013.)
statement:
cardaleph $p |- ( ( _om C_ A /\ ( card ` A ) = A ) -> A = ( aleph ` |^| { x e. On | A C_ ( aleph ` x ) } ) ) $.
$d A x $.
